code:
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "es5",
    "module": "commonjs",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "outDir": "./build",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true
  },
  "include": [
"./src/**/*"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "build"
  ]
}
